title: “Evo” magazine body text serif
author: Vykintas

comments.content:
Again, without a larger sample it’s hard to be positive, but Charter seems to be a decent match:  
 [https://www.fonts4ever.com/search\_result\_details.php?f\_shops\_id=2&select...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171057/https:/www.fonts4ever.com/search_result_details.php?f_shops_id=2&selectedFamilyID=230&f_item_name=Charter#familyName "https://www.fonts4ever.com/search\_result\_details.php?f\_shops\_id=2&selectedFamilyID=230&f\_item\_name=Charter#familyName")
You right about Charter! Thank you.
